content: MW-EB CL Channel lock kit with wire rope eyebolt ending Wire rope with pre-mounted threaded eyebolt and adjustable channel lock for suspending strut trapeze from concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire suspension kits give you a much faster alternative to traditional methods with threaded rod Versatile – you can use the same wire suspension kit with a wide range of fixtures, base materials and Hilti MT strut and MVA ventilation hardware, simplifying inventory management Easier to adjust – self-locking wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making levelling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler. Pre-mounted safety nuts on the locks can then be tightened to help fix the wire rope securely in place Productivity services available – engineering and prefabrication services can be provided on complex projects SMACNA compliance – tested and verified according to the HVAC Duct Construction Standards (ANSI/SMACNA 006-2006) Applications Suspending strut trapeze from concrete Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only ### TECHNICAL DATA:Material composition: Wire: steel, Lock: brass, Eye-bolt: steelSurface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanizedEnvironmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Wire: steel, Lock: brass, Eye-bolt: steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2331643 - Wire kit MW-EB 1/4 CL 2.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331644 - Wire kit MW-EB 1/4 CL 2.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331645 - Wire kit MW-EB 1/4 CL 2.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc - 2331649 - Wire kit MW-EB 3/8 CL 3.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331650 - Wire kit MW-EB 3/8 CL 3.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331651 - Wire kit MW-EB 3/8 CL 3.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc
